LINE_STYLE - Static variable in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.CometsSetupPanel
For use with different tool shapes.
LineTool - Class in edu.bu.segrelab.comets
The LineTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
LineTool(CometsSetupPanel, CometsToolbarPanel, CometsParameters) - Constructor for class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.LineTool
Constructs a new LineTool linked to a given CometsSetupPanel, CometsToolbarPanel and implementing a set of CometsParameters.
LOAD_CANCELED - Static variable in interface edu.bu.segrelab.comets.CometsConstants
 
loadLayoutDB() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Comets
Prompts the user to load a simulation layout from the public P-KOMETS database.
loadLayoutFile() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Comets
Prompts the user to load a layout file from the disk by spawning a file chooser.
loadLayoutFile(String, Comets) - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.CometsLoader
Loads a layout file and stores the results internally, according to the file constraints set up by the extending package.
loadModelFile() - Method in class edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Comets
Prompts the user to choose a model file for loading into memory.
